p: Although the consumption of fatty acids is described according to their beneficial effects on the health of the consumer, scientific information is still limited and controversial regarding the side effects of a prolonged intake of fatty acids of vegetable origin and there are no scientific reports on the effects of the prolonged consumption of A. phalerata nut oil. Therefore, this study identifies and quantifies the fatty acids present in A. phalerata nut oil for the first time and investigates its metabolic effects on rats with diet-induced hyperlipidemia.
